name: hierarchicalDS
body:
### Welcome to hierarchicalDS.
Welcome to the developer page for `hierarchicalDS`, an R package designed to facilitate
hierarchical analysis of distance sampling data from line transect studies (the code
has not yet been expanded to allow estimation of point count data).  

Here, you will find the latest stable (well, at least as far as I can tell) source code (check
out NEWS for release notes).  Unfortunately, Github no longer hosts certain types of files; 
for a vignette and binaries, please visit 

[Gmail drive](https://drive.google.com/?tab=mo&authuser=1#folders/0BzomuXDutCcRT2VHMUlqWDhqNlk)



Thanks for your interest in `hierarchicalDS`!


### Authors and Contributors
Paul Conn(@pconn)

### Support or Contact
For inquiries, bug reporting, etc. please contact Paul Conn at paul.conn 'at' noaa.gov
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
